thread.title: Donald
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Donald

author: Donald
title: Donald
text:
I needed to buy some oversized mat board. I looked all over the web and luckily found American Frame. They had what I needed, did not make me buy more than I needed, and shipped my boards in great safe packaging.
Buy with confidence you won't be disappointed...In fact, I will be because I screwed up the cutting..Should have remembered the adage measure twice and cut once!!.
Don
